Menag Singgung Celana Cingkrang, PAN: Cuma Naik Sedikit Apa Salahnya?
01 Nov 2019, 18:22 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - Menteri Agama (Menag) Fachrul Razi sempat menyinggung soal pemakaian celana cingkrang di instansi pemerintah. PAN menilai hal itu tidak substantif untuk diurusi.
"Apalagi celana, coba, ya menurut saya itu sangat-sangat tidak substantif pembicaraan soal celana cingkrang itu. Malah justru orang yang berpakaian terbuka seperti itu malah nggak pernah diprotesin itu, kan lucu juga," kata Wasekjen PAN Saleh Partaonan Daulay kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Saleh membandingkan Menag Fachrul, yang tak pernah memprotes orang yang berpakaian terbuka. Ia lalu mempertanyakan apa yang salah dengan memakai celana cingkrang.
"Belum pernah saya dengar misalnya pernyataan dari Menteri Agama yang, katakanlah, menasihati atau menyayangkan orang yang berpakaian terbuka begitu, nggak ada. Malah justru yang celana cingkrang begini. Cingkrang itu kan cuma naik sedikit saja ke atas, itu apa coba salahnya?" tanya Saleh.
Menurut Saleh, Fachrul sebagai menteri sebaiknya mengurusi masalah yang lebih penting di Kementerian Agama, seperti manajemen pendidikan dari sekolah dasar hingga perguruan tinggi di bawah Kemenag. Saleh mengatakan ada banyak masalah di sektor itu mulai dari mata pelajaran hingga guru honorer.
"Bayangkan, itu guru honorer sekarang yang bekerja di Kemenag itu yang mereka kesejahteraannya belum mencukupi, yang gajinya tidak cukup. Dan mereka bekerja ikhlas di daerah-daerah pelosok tanah air kita ini. Tolong itu dipikirkan, Pak Menteri, begitu. Jangan yang ini cingkrang-cingkrang apa segala macam, ini nggak penting sekali, nggak substantif itu," ujarnya.

Minister of Religion Touches Cingkrang Pants, PAN: Just a Little Up What's Wrong?
Nov 01 2019, 18:22 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - Minister of Religion (Menag) Fachrul Razi had mentioned the use of Cingkrang pants in government agencies. PAN considers it not substantive to be taken care of.
"Moreover, pants, try it, in my opinion it is very, very substantive discussion about the conical pants. In fact, even people who are dressed openly like that have never been protested, it's funny too," said Wasekjen PAN Saleh Partaonan Daulay told reporters on Friday (1/11/2019).
Saleh compared Minister of Religion Fachrul, who had never protested against people who were dressed openly. He then questioned what was wrong with wearing cone pants.
"I have never heard of such a statement from the Minister of Religion who, say, advise or deplore people who are dressed in open clothes like that, no. In fact, the one with such cone-shaped pants. The cone just goes up a little bit above, what is the harm?" Saleh asked.
According to Saleh, Fachrul as minister should take care of more important issues in the Ministry of Religion, such as management of education from elementary schools to tertiary institutions under the Ministry of Religion. Saleh said there were many problems in the sector ranging from subjects to honorary teachers.
"Imagine, now honorary teachers who work at the Ministry of Religion are of inadequate welfare, whose salaries are not enough. And they work sincerely in remote areas of our homeland. Please think about it, Mr. Minister, that is it. Don't get this cingkrang "What kind of environment is this, it's not very important, it's not substantive," he said.
